subject: Greetings and Prosperous New
body:
Greetings and Prosperous New Year to you and your entire family, I hope this message meets you in  good condition.
I write to inform you that you have been compensated with USD$1M, this compensation is a program organized by the European Union in collaboration with Standard Chartered Bank.
You happen to be selected for this program of funds compensation scheme that is why you are receiving this message.
Kindly contact Standard Chartered Bank, Mr. S.G,on this email (  
standardchartredstev@firemail.at
 )
Kindly send him your full name, home or office address, and phone number, and your winning code ( YYP2023) with this code he will identity its you
Best Regards
Madam Lee

subject: Re:   Greetings and Prosperous New
body:
Hello Madam Lee,

Thank you for your kind wishes and I hope the New Year brings prosperity to you as well. It's quite exciting to hear about this program organized by the European Union in collaboration with Standard Chartered Bank. 

Could you please provide more details about this program? How was I selected and what is the purpose of these funds? Also, could you tell me more about Mr. who I am supposed to contact?

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Paulette
